definitions.definition: To surround a territory or other geographical entity.
definitions.example: France, Portugal, Gibraltar and Andorra bound Spain.
The rabbit bounded down the lane.
a rubber ball bounds on the floor

definitions.definition: To cause to rebound; to throw so that it will rebound; to bounce.
definitions.example: to bound a ball on the floor

definitions.definition: (of a set) That can be enclosed within a ball of finite radius.
definitions.example: A compact set must be bounded.

definitions.definition: (of a poset X with partial order ≤) That contains a least element, a, and a greatest element, b, such that for all x ∈ X, a ≤ x ≤ b.
